item.title: Which platform to blog
item.description: Quickly after deciding to Blog, I needed to choose my platform. I have found quite a lot of blogging platforms free on Internet (blogger.com, medium.com, …). But I didn’t want to be locked down to one platform and as a developper I wanted to have the same process as coding. So I shorty felt the need to have something simple, something very similar to my day to day job, it’s why I chose to do my content in markdown and to deploy it as I push code to a git repo.
